title: I've never written a screenplay before but I could've written a better story for Suicide Squad
body:
Than the goons that they hired. 

1. Start with terrorist attack on US by Russian mercenary operatives under control of Russia / China / some place that's an ally. Maybe terrorists are meta humans as well. 

2. Governments question Russian / Chinese leadership about attack. Officials deny involvement

3. US officials realize that they need to find out which people are responsible, but directly attacking countries would start world war, end the world. 

4. Amanda Waller comes up with the idea to form suicide squad to act as super powered black ops team to infiltrate the country and find the people responsible 

5. We learn more about the members as they are captured / detained (a la The Usual Suspects)

6. They go on the mission

7. They find out who did it and kill them the end 

was that so hard gg
